questions: How to show a rating widget with a defined title and content using ThamesThrive?
What is the plugin used to show a rating widget with a defined title and content using ThamesThrive?
How to use the "Rating widget" plugin to show a rating widget with a defined title and content using ThamesThrive?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive show a rating widget with a defined title and content?
Yes, ThamesThrive can show a rating widget with a defined title and content using the "Rating widget" plugin
